InvokeMainTestCase
The superclass of test classes that invoke a main method to test a Java program.
InvokeMainTestCase.MainMethodResult
Invokes the main method of a class and captures information about the invocation such as the data written to standard out and standard error and the exit code.

This is a set of JUnit unit tests that test the functionality of an LRU Map.
MainClassContainsMutableStaticFields
Throws when the main method of a class with mutable static fields is invoked with InvokeMainTestCase.invokeMain(Class, String...).
